amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from provisions of the bill, asbestos trusts with internal anti-fraud procedures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-264 to exempt from the bill asbestos trusts with internal anti-fraud procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 223 (Roll no. 575).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 223 (Roll no. 575).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cohen.
